title: Hacking account easily than ever
body:
This is the worst support team i had ever experienced in my life. My account got hacked, i received mails for changing password and i didn't use the code and somehow someone know the code and change it . He changed the email . How can someone change password and mail by not knowing the code that i received on my mail. Can someone explain me? and plus i send them all the payments i done on my account and all the gifts i received on my account and they can't back my account....
                                                                  
  {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: It's likely that the unauthorized party may also have access to your email.  I highly recommend going through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to help secure your info in and outside of league.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as well, and our account team can help recover both your account and update your info.  Hang tight, we'll help fix this up!
I have access to my main mail. I can recovery my password and username but i can't log in. I gave all the questions that i need to give to them and they can't back my account.

First of all, if you had calmed down a bit and used proper grammar this would not have taken me 4 reads to understand what you meant.

Secondly, that would more likely not be a hack but a Trojan. A Virus that infested your PC. If that Person went after your league of legends account, changes are high you fell for one of those Free RP Phishing links. 

As for Riot, they really cannot compensate because noone can truly verify if your story is true or not. they have to deal with false claims of hacks every day, people wanting to abuse riot's nonexistential naivity to get some extra rewards for a boosting smurf acc.

Everything what you said is true but if you gave all the questions that they need to back your account they should back it ? Right ? I don't get how can someone change the email by not knowing the code? I can recovery my password and username but what if i can when i can't log in?
